body_html: It can, but it would work differently than all other methods and would have to be moved to C. Also, we would need to go over all of our functions and make sure it is called before the tensors are actually mutated. But yes, as long as we do it this way it should actually be possible to raise errors before mutation

body: It can, but it would work differently than all other methods and would have to be moved to C. Also, we would need to go over all of our functions and make sure it is called before the tensors are actually mutated. But yes, as long as we do it this way it should actually be possible to raise errors before mutation
